body.message_content:
Thanks for the warning, John. Appreciated. Even though it's a day late.

---
Jane Smith
Colonist

Thought you might want to hear about this

I know, I know, just don't shoot the messenger.

Here's a few photos of this madness:

[/IMAGE]

[IMAGE]
(screenshot of tweet)
Tweet from @johndoe "Well, at least their drummers have a sense of rhythm." with 2,324 likes, 419 retweets/quotes, and 117 replies
[/IMAGE]

Wild, eh?

I think that's [REDACTED] next to [REDACTED].

THE REDCOATS ARE COMING!!
